input.title: Record Input
input.description: Record your health data to track your daily health status
input.subtitle: Record your health data
input.currentTimeDescription: Automatically set the current date and time
input.notesPlaceholder: Feel free to note your daily condition, observations, or anything noteworthy
input.notesDescription: You can enter up to {{maxLength}} characters

list.title: List
list.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this record?

export.title: Settings
export.exportDescription: You can export your recorded data in CSV or JSON format. Use it for backup or analysis with other tools.
export.importDescription: You can restore records from previously exported CSV or JSON files.
export.testDataDescription: You can generate sample data for testing purposes.
export.dangerZoneDescription: The following operations cannot be undone. Please be careful.
export.confirmDeleteAll:
‚ö†Ô∏è Warning: All data (records and fields) will be completely deleted.

This operation cannot be undone.

Are you sure you want to delete all data?
export.confirmDeleteAllFinal:
üö® Final Confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete all data?

We recommend backing up your data.
export.confirmGenerateTestData:
üß™ Generate test data?

This will create about 100 random data entries for the past 30 days.
They will be added to your existing data.
export.deleteAllSuccess: ‚úÖ All data has been deleted and initial fields have been restored.
export.unsupportedFileFormat: ‚ùå Unsupported file format (only .csv or .json files are supported)

management.title: Settings
management.deleteWarning: Delete All Data: All record data will be permanently deleted.
management.deleteConfirmation:
‚ö†Ô∏è Warning: All data (records and items) will be permanently deleted.

This action cannot be undone.

Are you sure you want to delete all data?
management.deleteFinalConfirmation:
üö® Final Confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete all data?

We recommend backing up your data before proceeding.
management.deleteSuccess: ‚úÖ All data has been deleted and initial items have been restored.

sort.title: Sort Items
sort.description: You can change the display order of items using drag & drop or keyboard. Drag the handle on the right or focus and press Space key to start sorting. You can also toggle the visibility of each item from the buttons.
sort.saveOrder: Save item order and display settings

validation.notesMaxLength: Notes must be {{max}} characters or less
validation.duplicateFieldName: A field with the same name already exists

aria.fieldNameDescription: Enter the name of the item you want to record
aria.dataTypeDescription: Select the type of data for this item
aria.unitFieldDescription: Enter the unit for this item (e.g. kg, mmHg)

errors.general: An error occurred. Please try again.
errors.network: Network error occurred. Please check your connection and try again.
errors.database: Database error occurred. Please try again later.
errors.notFound: The requested data was not found.
errors.timeout: The operation timed out. Please try again.
errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this operation.
errors.forbidden: Access to this resource is forbidden.
errors.server: Server error occurred. Please try again later.
errors.unknown: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.
errors.authentication: Authentication issue. Please reload the page and try again.
errors.permission: You do not have permission to perform this operation.
errors.inputPageError: Failed to load record input page.
errors.listPageError: Failed to load record list page.
errors.fieldDataNotFound: Field data not found. Please reload the page.

announcements.dialogOpened: Item sorting dialog opened. You can close it with the Escape key.
announcements.fieldTempDisplayAdded: Field has been added to temporary display
announcements.sortOrderSaved: Sort order has been saved successfully

instructions.navigation: Use arrow keys to navigate, Enter to select
instructions.dragAndDrop: Drag & drop or press Space to sort
instructions.formControls: Tab to next item, Shift+Tab to previous item

common.confirmDeleteField:
Are you sure you want to delete the field "{{fieldName}}"?

All record data related to this field will also be deleted.

sortModal.title: Sort Fields
sortModal.description: You can change the display order of fields using drag & drop or keyboard. Drag the handle on the right or focus and press Space to start sorting. You can also toggle the visibility of each field using the buttons.
sortModal.visibleDescription: Currently visible. Press Enter to hide.
sortModal.hiddenDescription: Currently hidden. Press Enter to show.
sortModal.saveLabel: Save field order and display settings
sortModal.openedAnnouncement: Sort fields dialog opened. Press Escape to close.
